Name: Forex Trading Master: Simulator
About the game: This is a simulation of foreign currencies trading game, the data is synchronized in real-time from Bankâ€™s Website and API provider. You can learn how to trade foreign currencies in this game. The game currently supports more than 30 kinds of foreign currency exchanges and equip with time-sharing trading charts to help you grasp market conditions. The game has added features such as leverage, futures and quantitative strategies etc. The leaderboard feature will show you the rankings of players around the world. The game supports the Steam Inventory, you can exchange USD to items and sell them on the Steam Market. We plan to hold regular events to reward players who are participating in the competition and at the top(1-50). The game has 4 modes: Simulation Trading, Simulated Lever Trading, Simulated Real-Time Trading and built-in games. Choose the mode you like and show your talent! Quantitative Strategy: easy to get 30%+ profit in one month
